name: Momo
description: Momo is a popular Nepali dumpling, often filled with minced meat or vegetables. It is served with a spicy tomato sauce.

name: Dal Bhat
description: Dal Bhat is the staple food of Nepal, consisting of steamed rice (bhat) and lentil soup (dal), often accompanied by vegetable curry.

name: Aloo Tama
description: Aloo Tama is a traditional Nepali curry made with potatoes, bamboo shoots, and sometimes black-eyed peas. It's a tangy and spicy dish served with rice.

name: Sel Roti
description: Sel Roti is a traditional Nepali homemade, sweet, ring-shaped rice bread/doughnut, crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, usually made during festivals.

name: Gundruk
description: Gundruk is a traditional fermented leafy green vegetable, typically served as a side dish or soup. It has a tangy flavor and is a source of vitamins in Nepali cuisine.
